artist: The School of the Master of Mary of Burgundy
medium: Ink, gouache, and gilding on vellum
title: Illuminated Page, from a Book of Hours, recto and verso (Horae)
description: Double-sided; hand-illuminated with color in gold leaf, ivy scrolls and gold-leaf \"pellets\", and elaborate initials
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
